mention.text: William A. Ackman of Pershing Square
billions of dollars and plenty of accolades
Some of the investment world 's best-known investors
Mr. Ackman 's firm , Pershing Square Capital Management
his investors 19.3 percent , much of the decline driven by Valeant
Ruane , Cunniff & Goldfarb , an investment fund once known for its ties to Warren E. Buffett
an investment fund once known for its ties to Warren E. Buffett
a hedge fund founded by John A. Paulson
Mr. Paulson , who made billions of dollars on a bet against subprime mortgages
the fund that holds Valeant shares
a lawyer for hedge funds at Sadis & Goldberg
2015 - not 2014 , which is the year Mr. Ackman teamed up with the company in a joint takeover effort
An article on Thursday about a sharp drop in the value of Valeant Pharmaceutical International shares and the effect on a major investor , Pershing Square Capital Management
